channel.title: Adding summoning to 639
channel.description: hi i have been trying to add summoning for a while now to my server. im using this guide http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=535261.0 but when i need to do the actionbuttonhandler and inventorylistener i get errors, can someone get on teamviewer with me and try to help?

item.title: Adding summoning to 639
item.dc:creator: @pray4urlife pray4urlife
item.description:

[quote=“levi_rosini@yahoo.com, post:1, topic:435916”]hi i have been trying to add summoning for a while now to my server. im using this guide http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=535261.0 but when i need to do the actionbuttonhandler and inventorylistener i get errors, can someone get on teamviewer with me and try to help?[/quote]Thats probably why that guy has 0 rep… also i recommend you read comments before you use a tutorial…
